intro: Psychotria androsaemifolia, commonly known as the Andros Island Psychotria, is a flowering plant native to the Caribbean island of Andros. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale green flowers. It is often found in moist, shaded environments within the tropical rainforests of the region. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
